title: 2011 Abierto Mexicano Telcel
text:
The 2011 <a href="Abierto%20Mexicano%20Telcel">Abierto Mexicano Telcel</a> was a professional <a href="tennis">tennis</a> tournament played on <a href="Tennis%20court%23Clay%20courts">clay courts</a>. It was the 18th edition of the men's tournament (11th for the women), which was part of the <a href="2011%20ATP%20World%20Tour">2011 ATP World Tour</a> and the <a href="2011%20WTA%20Tour">2011 WTA Tour</a>. It took place in <a href="Acapulco">Acapulco</a>, <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a> between 21 and 26 February 2011.

Finals.
Men's singles.
 <a href="David%20Ferrer">David Ferrer</a> defeated <a href="Nicol%C3%A1s%20Almagro">Nicolás Almagro</a>, 7–6(7–4), 6–7(2–7), 6–2
Women's singles.
 <a href="Gisela%20Dulko">Gisela Dulko</a> defeated <a href="Arantxa%20Parra%20Santonja">Arantxa Parra Santonja</a>, 6–3, 7–6(7–5)
Men's doubles.
 <a href="Victor%20H%C4%83nescu">Victor Hănescu</a> / <a href="Horia%20Tec%C4%83u">Horia Tecău</a> defeated <a href="Marcelo%20Melo">Marcelo Melo</a> / <a href="Bruno%20Soares">Bruno Soares</a>, 6–1, 6–3
Women's doubles.
 <a href="Mariya%20Koryttseva">Mariya Koryttseva</a> / <a href="Ioana%20Raluca%20Olaru">Ioana Raluca Olaru</a> defeated <a href="Lourdes%20Dom%C3%ADnguez%20Lino">Lourdes Domínguez Lino</a> / <a href="Arantxa%20Parra%20Santonja">Arantxa Parra Santonja</a>, 3–6, 6–1, [10–4]
